text: Ascanius may refer to: *In Classical mythology: ** Ascanius, the son of Aeneas ** Ascanius, a son of Priam ** Ascanius, a son of Aretaon * Lake Ascanius in Anatolia. * Peter Ascanius (1723–1803), Norwegian biologist. * Domenicus van Wijnen, called Ascanius (1661 – c.1695), Dutch painter.
title: Ascanius (disambiguation)
